title: PES Alumni/Current students I need your help plsss
content:
So I came across this interesting site made by students from Arizona University, [https://www.asuranked.com/](https://www.asuranked.com/)  
ITS JUST SO HILARIOUS, and yes I want to make something like this but with PES, now I could just scrape from LinkedIn (probably illegal idk XD) but then its better to take consent you knowüôèüèª.

Please fill out this form if you're in for the fun.  
[https://forms.gle/tdgaobmq5ddZQm4d6](https://forms.gle/tdgaobmq5ddZQm4d6)

comments.body: Scraping Linkedin is illegal(i found out recently) xD , interesting project however
If people are willing to share their linkedIn profiles yes ,quite simple from there ngl
They probably took it down, lemme just edit the post so that people know what the website was about
